properties.name: jeap.sse.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the jEAP Server-Sent Events (SSE) support

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.insecure.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the insecure acces to the jEAP SSE Web Server

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint for the jEAP SSE Web Server

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.auth.role
properties.description: Role required to access the jEAP SSE Web Server if set, for simple authentication

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.auth.resource
properties.description: Resource required to access the jEAP SSE Web Server if set, for semantic authentication

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.auth.operation
properties.description: Operation required to access the jEAP SSE Web Server if set, for semantic authentication

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.heartbeat.rateInMs
properties.description: Rate in milliseconds for the heartbeat messages sent by the jEAP SSE Web Server

properties.name: jeap.sse.web.emitter.timeoutInMs
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the jEAP SSE Web Server emitter

properties.name: jeap.sse.kafka.topic
properties.description: Kafka topic to which the jEAP SSE Web Server will subscribe and publish, should be system-applicationname-notifyclient
